actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the construction by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs of a full service hospital in Far South Texas.
short_title: Far South Texas Veterans Medical Center Act of 2009

summary.text: Far South Texas Veterans Medical Center Act of 2009 - Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to construct a major medical facility project in Far South Texas, consisting of a full-service Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) hospital, to meet the health care needs of veterans residing in such area.

titles.title: Far South Texas Veterans Medical Center Act of 2009
A bill to provide for the construction by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs of a full service hospital in Far South Texas.
